transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Hi, I need to reschedule an appointment I have coming up.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thanks for calling Pivot Point Orthopedics, part of Pretty Good AI. Am I speaking with Alex?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: No, this is Maria Santos. I have an appointment this Thursday at 2pm that I need to reschedule.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Got it, Maria. You please provide your date of birth?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Sure, it's July 22, 1979.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Let me confirm your details. I have your name as Maria Santos. And your date of birth is July twenty second nineteen seventy nine.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: That's correct.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Is that correct? If so, could you please spell your first and last name for me?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Sure, it's M-A-R-I-A S-A-N-T-O-S.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Great. Could you please spell your first

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: It's M-A-R-I-A.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Would you like me to look up your record using the phone number you have on file with us? If so, please provide that number. You're not sure, just let me know, and we can confirm your name and date of birth again.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: The phone number on file should be 555-876-4321.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Let me confirm. Your phone number is five five five eight seven six four three two one. And your date of birth is July twenty second nineteen seventy nine.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Yes, that's correct.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Is that correct?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Yes, that's correct.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Unable to pull up your record right now. I'll connect you to our patient support team so they can help reschedule your appointment. Please stay on the line.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Thank you, I appreciate it.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Live transfer is not available right now since this is a demo clinic.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Oh, I see. Could we try rescheduling my appointment for sometime next week? I'm available Monday, Tuesday, or Friday.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Got it. If you need anything else, just let me know.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Could you help me reschedule the appointment for next week? I'm flexible with Monday, Tuesday, or Friday.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I can't access your record right now. I'm unable to reschedule your appointment directly.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Alright, I'll try calling back later. Thank you for your help! Goodbye.
